column1: Topic title: Najib s aide  1MDB negotiator and alleged RM2m rec

column8: aCsmrTDJg0sNajib's aide, 1MDB negotiator and alleged RM2m recipientPublished on May 3, 2017PKR vice-president Rafizi Ramli dropped a bombshell yesterday, claiming that a company owned by Amhari Efendi Nazaruddin, an aide of Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak, had received RM2 million from Najib.
Macai Scumno will say 2m ciput only.
RM 2m is for afternoon tea-time only.
Highly skilled negotiator of course must receive a commission to strike the best deal on behalf of Malaysia.
Serious? Government dunno how to negotiate with foreign governments? Damn malu sia
